title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed in the expressions instead of the alias name.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking on a column name, the alias name should be displayed instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 
2. Set alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and double-click on the first column name.
